name: Dino Walk Simulator
description:
Race Dinosaurs! or Race Zombie Dinosaurs!With friends!
  • Choose from over 34 dinosaurs from the Triassic, Jurassic and Cretaceous periods including Ankylosaurus, Spinosaurus, Tyrannosaurus rex, Giganotosaurus, Carnotaurus, Cryolophosaurus, Carcharodontosaurus, Titanosaurus, Tarbosaurus and more
  • 1-4 Multiplayer: race against 3 CPU dinosaurs or total 4 human players in local multiplayer
  • Prehistoric racing in 10 different locations!
  • Physically Simulated Dinosaurs!
  • Zombie Dinosaurs! (double-tap/click the DinoWalkSim logo from About)
  • Authentic retro mid-90s 32bit console/arcade real-time 3D graphics!
  • CRT/TV Filter as lowest Anti-Alias Option
  • Works with keyboard (huddle around or use a few keyboards) and 360 controllers (more controller support coming soon)
  • Available on Amazon Kindle + FireTV, Google Play + Android TV, and Apple iPhone
  • Cardboard VR Viewer Support added on Android!
